dungeons_and_dragons.model

Class GameMapModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • dungeons_and_dragons.model.GameMapModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Model<GameMapModel>

    public class GameMapModel
extends Observable
implements Model<GameMapModel>
    This class is created to manage map data,store all the points of map walls,enemies,entry door, exit door and chest.
    Author:
    Mihir Pujara and Urmil Kansara

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      To restrict the map to be filled by default with entry door
